programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: A man (John Cusack) and a woman (Kate Beckinsale) try to find each other after spending one night together 10 years earlier.

programme.title: Juliet, Naked
programme.desc: Annie breaks up with her longtime boyfriend Duncan -- a teacher who's obsessed with former 1990s rocker Tucker Crowe. She soon develops an unexpected bond with Tucker when he visits his pregnant daughter in London.

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Four friends (Morris Chestnut, D.L. Hughley, Bill Bellamy) question women, relationships and honesty after one of them becomes engaged.

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: Former CIA employee Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) becomes a fugitive after leaking classified information from the National Security Agency.

programme.title: The Tree of Life
programme.desc: Disillusioned in a modern world, a man (Sean Penn) tries to come to terms with the complicated relationship that he shared with his father (Brad Pitt).

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: An Irish immigrant (Saoirse Ronan) in 1950s New York falls for a tough Italian plumber (Emory Cohen), but faces temptation from another man (Domhnall Gleeson) when she returns to her homeland for a visit.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953 a professor (Julia Roberts) of art history challenges her female students (Kirsten Dunst, Julia Stiles) to re-examine the traditional roles of women.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: An attractive lawyer and Bridget's (Renée Zellweger) former boss (Hugh Grant) threaten her newfound happiness with Mark Darcy (Colin Firth).

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey bartender (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) embarks on his first genuine relationship with a woman (Scarlett Johansson), but his constant craving for Internet porn threatens to bring things crashing down.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: After meeting the gal (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) of his dreams, a charming slacker (Michael Cera) must contend with an army of her ex-boyfriends, wanting to get rid of him.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers -- and falls in love with -- a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: The Player
programme.desc: About 65 real-life movie stars fringe the satire of a Hollywood studio executive (Tim Robbins) who gets away with murder.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: Quasifederal agents hunt a man (David Keith),who can bend minds, and his daughter (Drew Barrymore),who can start fires by staring.

programme.title: Dance With Me
programme.desc: In Houston to meet his father (Kris Kristofferson), a young Cuban (Chayanne) enters a dance contest and falls for a pretty dancer (Vanessa L. Williams).

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Nothing seems to go right for young Kate, a frustrated Londoner who works as an elf in a year-round Christmas shop. But things soon take a turn for the better when she develops a growing attraction to a charming suitor who seems too good to be true.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: The Assistant
programme.desc: Digital assistants are programmed to help people. However, when one such bot goes rogue, it ends up becoming a nightmare for its owner, who is stepping into new beginnings.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: A hit man (Jason Statham) awakes to the news that he has been poisoned and will die in an hour unless he keeps adrenaline coursing through his body.

programme.title: Destroy All Monsters!
programme.desc: Scientists (Jun Tazaki, Yoshio Tsuchiya) face Godzilla, Rodan, Mothra and more obscure Japanese monsters sent by she-aliens.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure fellow Olympic hopeful Nancy Kerrigan.

programme.title: Radio

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor

programme.title: The Top Ten Revealed

programme.title: The Top Ten Revealed

programme.title: Nothing But Videos
programme.desc: Featuring some of the best music during this special holiday presentation.

programme.title: The Top Ten Revealed

programme.desc: Briscoe and Green discover conflicting information about a down-and-out Vietnam veteran who is murdered.

programme.desc: Detectives Briscoe and Green investigate the slaying of a hit man.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Millions of dollars in diamonds link to two murders and to civil strife in Sierra Leone.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives sort through a murdered tenant's long-running battle with her landlord in order to find a possible suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the shooting death of a once-popular singer's wife.

programme.desc: Lt. Van Buren discovers that someone may have tampered with evidence she used to convict a man 12 years earlier.

programme.desc: The skull of a promising young dancer is discovered at a construction site; Hannah's safety is jeopardized when an assignment takes her to a dangerous part of town.

programme.desc: Human remains from a 150-year-old slave ship surface; the investigation leads Booth and Brennan to a cruise where a murder victim was seen moments before his death.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: An event for a candymaker (Wayne Knight) turns bitter when human remains are discovered in the world's largest chocolate bar; Cam struggles with her daughter's decision to attend a college that fails to meet her high standards.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate a crime scene where a human carcass has melted to the dashboard of a charred truck; Sweets tries to keep his feelings for Daisy from interfering while helping her pass a government psychological evaluation.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A brilliant and career-driven surgeon is found dead in a rough neighborhood; a new friend helps Brennan make a discovery about herself.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A body is found in the shower of a home belonging to a young socialite; Hodgins and Angela talk about their future; Booth talks to Hannah about Brennan's feeling for him.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Jeffersonian team investigates when a notorious murderer known as "The Gravedigger" (Deirdre Lovejoy) is killed by a sniper.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A man's corpse disguised as a scarecrow is found in a cornfield; Booth and Brennan question the victim's three wives, who are also sisters; Cam doubts her relationship.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team analyzes a BMX rider's remains, discovered on the roof of a warehouse; Sweets asks Booth for advice; Booth makes a decision about Hannah.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the liquefied remains of a wedding planner are found in a tanning bed on Valentine's Day, Cam pressures the team to work fast so she can spend the holiday with her boyfriend; Clark helps Hodgins realize the best gifts come from the heart.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Sniper Jacob Broadsky takes out a victim who escaped from the justice system; Booth uses his military training to try to stop Broadsky before he strikes again; Angela's father visits the Jeffersonian.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: During a blizzard that causes a citywide blackout, the team must solve a murder case that could be connected to a possible viral outbreak; Sweets starts a touchy conversation about Brennan and Booth's relationship.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan teams up with a forensic podiatrist to match seven pairs of severed feet with bodies; Cam makes college plans for her daughter.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A TV-show host's remains are found in the wilderness; Vincent Nigel-Murray makes surprising confessions while making amends with each member of the team.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the remains of a maritime museum security guard are found in the Florida Everglades, Booth asks a former Iraqi soldier for help with the case.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of a successful ad man are found in a new community center playground; the members of the team try to communicate more honestly.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: An unidentified 15-year-old girl, who is hearing impaired and not able to communicate, is found covered in blood and wielding a knife; Angela hides the details of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth becomes more determined to catch Jacob Broadsky after he takes out another victim.

programme.desc: Booth and Brennan go under cover to find out what happened to a man whose remains were found lodged in the pinsetter at a bowling lane.

programme.desc: Una adolescente lucha por hacer sus sueños realidad, pero debe lidiar con un embarazo no deseado y un matrimonio inestable.

programme.title: Bloodworth
programme.desc: Han pasado 40 años desde que E. F. Bloodworth decidiera abandonar a su mujer y a sus hijos para pasar la vida en la carretera. Ya en el ocaso, Bloodworth reaparece, pero tiene que aceptar las amargas consecuencias de su partida.

programme.desc: Basada en la obra acerca de seis mujeres sureñas que se vuelven amigas cercanas a pesar de sus excentricidades y vidas complicadas.

programme.desc: Quasifederal agents hunt a man (David Keith),who can bend minds, and his daughter (Drew Barrymore),who can start fires by staring.

programme.desc: A crook on the run cons his way into a dinner party whose host is anything but ordinary.

programme.desc: A young woman (Winona Ryder) with a borderline personality disorder stays in a 1960s mental institution for 18 months.

programme.desc: A software designer (Bridget Fonda) shares her Manhattan apartment with a young woman (Jennifer Jason Leigh) who's dangerous.

programme.desc: After contracting polio at the age of 28, Robin Cavendish is confined to a bed and given only months to live. With help from his family and inventor Teddy Hall, Cavendish devotes the rest of his life to helping fellow patients and the disabled.

programme.desc: Michael's highfalutin attempts to resolve conflicts in the office only serve to stir up petty differences and forgotten arguments among his employees, causing bedlam and tumult at Dunder Mifflin. programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael tries to get extra sympathy from his staff after he burns his foot on a portable cooking grill. Dwight emerges as the primary caregiver---to Michael's chagrin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: In his new endeavours, Michael faces mounting financial difficulties and problems with early-morning deliveries. Meanwhile, Angela plays enforcer as the staffers try to finish their expense reports on deadline.

programme.desc: When half a joint is found on company property, Dwight dons his Lackawanna County volunteer deputy sheriff's uniform (complete with badge) and launches an investigation. programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: An office power play ensues when ultraserious Angela, offended by Michael's various antics and his inefficient leadership, leans heavily on Dwight to make a push for Michael's job. programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. With Pam as his driver, Michael goes on a speaking tour to other Dunder-Mifflin branches to share insight about Scranton's relative success. programme.desc: Conclusion. Accompanied by Pam, Michael continues his speaking tour of various Dunder-Mifflin branches, with the Utica division offering a valuable life lesson for Michael. programme.title: The Office

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael pushes his desk jockeys to pair up and hit the road for sales-call duty. Meanwhile, Angela misses a crucial deadline, so her secret boyfriend, Dwight, tries to cover for her; and surprising news comes Karen's way.

programme.desc: Dwight wins an award for top salesman of the year, but has to conquer his fear of public speaking when he must give a speech at a big Northeast Sales Association convention. programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Corporate bigwig David Wallace summons a jubilant Michael to attend a shareholders meeting in New York City. Michael invites Andy, Dwight and Oscar to tag along. Meanwhile, Jim clashes with a lazy Ryan back at the office.

programme.title: The Office

programme.title: Night Train to Paris
programme.desc: A retired OSS officer who lives in London is visited on New Year's Eve by a close friend of a man who served with the officer during the war, and he is called back into action to keep a sensitive tape away from rival agents.

programme.title: State Fair

programme.title: Rio Conchos
programme.desc: Just after the Civil War, a captain, a sergeant and two ragtag prisoners ride into Mexico with a wagonload of gunpowder as bait to draw out a former Confederate officer who has plans of selling 2,000 stolen repeating rifles to the Apaches.

programme.title: Kid Blue
programme.desc: After a robbery a former convict settles down in a small Texas town and attempts to correct his old ways, but the temptation begins to be too much and he is drawn back into a life of crime, making off with a factory's entire Christmas payroll.

programme.title: Bad Girls

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance

programme.title: Lakefront Bargain Hunt: Renovation

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.desc: Mark Bowe recalls places where the guys have taken in local history over the years; they visit Colorado's Canyons of the Ancients, explore how pioneers built cabins with shorter trees in Texas, and Mark sees a Virginia church built by his ancestor.

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.desc: Honoring the craftsmanship of the American pioneer is at the heart of every job, so Mark Bowe revisits some of the most talented artisans the guys have ever met, including woodworkers, blacksmiths, leather makers, glass blowers and more.

programme.title: Restored
programme.desc: Brett restores an enormous Arts and Crafts home with six bedrooms for a family that has grown from four children to eight; Brett brings the master bedroom back to life, creates a new bathroom upstairs and reconfigures the kitchen.

programme.title: Restored
programme.desc: Brett needs to update a 1902 Queen Anne Victorian house for a large family; previous residents made changes to the flow of the house.

programme.title: Restored

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Agassiz Village provides underprivileged and at-risk kids an opportunity to experience a camp surrounded by the beauty of Maine; with support from the community, Chase and his team take on the big project with a small budget to help the camp.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Lifelong Mainers bought their Belgrade cabin in 1987 and have maintained it over the years, but the list of needed repairs continues to grow; the team gives the camp much-needed life by rebuilding its front wall and replacing the heating system.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A family in Ryan's hometown has a pair of cabins right on the water in dire need of updates after 40 years of use; the Cabin Masters provide a facelift, including updated foundations and much-deserved creature comforts.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A couple found their own slice of heaven overlooking Lake Annabessacook, only to find out it needs more work than they could provide; the team takes the building out of its current 1950's decor and updates it with modern touches.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A group of brothers who inherited a rugged hunting cabin from their father and his friends enlist the team to restore it and preserve its legacy.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Gary and his wife Ellen inherited 97 acres of pristine land in the lush woods of Manchester Maine; ultimate dream for Gary and Ellen is to see a cabin finished so they can enjoy it with their three grown children and four grandchildren.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Bishops' waterside cottage was built in the 1930s and is overdue for an upgrade; the crew powers through demo day, upcycles some of the original lumber and expands the place upward and outward.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: For the first time in Cabin Masters history, a structure is so bad that they have to tear it down to the foundation and start from scratch; the team must stay on task and ultimately recreate the cabin that the owners have dreamed of for their family.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The team has their hands full as they navigate a treacherous hillside to stabilize a camp and restore it so a family can continue to enjoy it for at least anther 42 years.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters

programme.desc: Two animal lovers call on Chase Morrill and his team to transform their West Gardiner cabin into a pet sanctuary; the crew works to bring modern-day amenities into a cabin that's over 100 years old while maintaining its rustic appeal.

programme.title: Gearz

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: As sorority sisters prepare for holiday parties, a mysterious cloaked figure starts to leave a bloody trail throughout their campus. Refusing to become victims, the girls decide to band together and fight back against the psychotic Christmas killer.

programme.title: The Art of Self-Defense
programme.desc: After getting attacked on the street, a man enlists in a local dojo that's led by a charismatic and mysterious sensei. He soon uncovers a sinister fraternity of violence and masculinity while trying to learn how to defend himself.

programme.title: The Lobster
programme.desc: In a dystopian society, single people must find a mate within 45 days or be transformed into an animal of their choice.

programme.title: Everybody Wants to Be Italian
programme.desc: A lovelorn Polish fishmonger (Jay Jablonski) lies about his ethnicity to woo a beautiful Italian veterinarian (Cerina Vincent).

programme.title: The Extra Man
programme.desc: A flamboyant literature professor (Kevin Kline), who escorts rich old women on the side, teaches his cross-dressing roommate (Paul Dano) his unique perspective on life.

programme.title: Shadow Dancer
programme.desc: Arrested after a failed bombing attempt, a single mother and IRA member (Andrea Riseborough) falls into the hands of a British agent (Clive Owen) who offers her a choice: Spy on her IRA comrades, or spend a long prison term away from her young son.

programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: After his arm becomes pinned by a boulder in a remote canyon, mountaineer Aron Ralston (James Franco) must do the unthinkable in order to survive.

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld while her son discovers an underwater town.

programme.title: Hereditary
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Immortals
programme.desc: A Greek stonemason named Theseus (Henry Cavill) revolts against a bloodthirsty king who wants to throw the gods out of Olympus and become master of the world.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Haunted by his inability to locate Job, Lucas returns to Banshee to find the town dramatically changed, with a new sheriff, a new mayor, and a serial murderer on the loose.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Carrie embarks on a vigilante crusade against members of the Brotherhood; Brock's gaze turns toward Lucas in the serial-murder case.

programme.title: Troll Hunter
programme.desc: While investigating reports of illegal poaching, three student filmmakers encounter a man (Otto Jespersen) who slays trolls for the Norwegian government.

programme.title: The Monster
programme.desc: Left stranded after their car breaks down, a woman (Zoe Kazan) and her daughter (Ella Ballentine) must fight for survival when a terrifying monster attacks them on a deserted road near the woods.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: Bewildered residents (Haruhiko Katô, Kumiko Asô, Koyuki) of Tokyo investigate strange events linked to computers and the Internet.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: A sadistic Chicago lawman (Guy Pearce) comes to 1931 Virginia to shut down the Bondurant brothers' (Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke) bootlegging business.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Mass Ave
programme.desc: A racial profiling incident forever changes the relationship between a man and his son.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman (Amy Poehler) and her hotheaded sister (Tina Fey) throw a party that spirals out of control at their childhood home.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: A doctor (Tom Hiddleston) moves into a London skyscraper where rising tensions and class warfare lead to anarchy.

programme.title: American Renegades
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In 1823, fur trapper Hugh Glass (Leonardo DiCaprio) treks through the snowy wilderness to track down John Fitzgerald (Tom Hardy), a member of his hunting team who killed his young son (Forrest Goodluck) and left him for dead.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Lucas and Carrie make a last-ditch attempt to free Job; Proctor learns that generosity can sometimes go unrewarded.

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Carrie strikes again; Bunker treads on thin ice; another grisly murder sends shock waves throughout Banshee.

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: A former spy puts his extensive training to the test when he must rescue his kidnapped daughter from sex-slave traffickers.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent (Jason Statham) returns to action to save his daughter and his new town from a drug-dealing sociopath (James Franco).

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Framed for a covert assassination, a blade-wielding former Federale (Danny Trejo) carves a path of blood, bullets and broken hearts as he carries out a mission of revenge.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: Shorty's right-hand man in the body shop, Joe Gomez, has been in remission from cancer for nearly 10 years and wants to create a widebody Honda Accord for his wife to show his appreciation.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: After losing a grandson in a racetrack crash, Rick Wilson and his family want to raise money to promote safety at tracks around Texas; they enlist Shorty and the team to build a 1956 Corvette that will be auctioned off for their cause.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: Shorty tries to match the Ember Glow hemi's original color, then works his magic in the paint booth; Joel tries to figure out how to install an aftermarket AC; PG works on the interior; the crew is left with an enormous amount of trim.

programme.title: Street Outlaws vs. the World
programme.desc: After multiple callout videos are posted online, the Outlaws head to Australia to show those racers what they've got; their first stop is Perth, and with big money on the line and the USA on their backs, the American racers aim for total domination.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: Still exhausted from SEMA in Las Vegas, Mark and the Ghoulz get back to the grind; Will prepares to paint his first 1970 AAR 'Cuda; with Mark breathing down his neck and micromanaging his methods, Will's rebellious nature is stirred up.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: As far as dual-quad manifolds go, it's hard to beat the cool factor of the tunnel-ram and cross-ram setups; to see which makes more power, the guys bolt each to the 383 Chevy and stagger jets until their gasoline-soaked hearts are content.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys get their '73/74 dirt-track Duster back up and running for a road trip and off-road.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys attempt to keep a '39 Ford running on a 1,000-mile road trip.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich attempt to get a '67 Jeep Wagoneer that languished for 31 years back on the road from Yakima, Washington; they find Dulcich's dream '64 Cadillac DeVille convertible in the process.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: A twist of fate reunites a man with a Dodge Li'l Red Express he once bought from his boss at a local pizza joint.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: A rental vehicle loaded with parts and a dream of a perfect Plymouth Business Coupe arrives at the shop; Dan works to locate a 1972 Buick Gran Sport and then restore it with hard-to-find features.

programme.title: FantomWorks

programme.desc: A repeat client and collaborator's new project for Kindig It is a 1927 Shadow Rod; a 2017 Bentley Bentayga receives some styling upgrades.

programme.title: High Life

programme.desc: The grown children of an overbearing Chinese matriarch reluctantly gather to take part in seven days' worth of traditional funeral rites.

programme.desc: A high-school poetry teacher (Robin Williams) is also a single father and dreams of becoming a successful writer, but a freak accident leads to both tragedy and opportunity.

programme.desc: Carved by a lonely carpenter longing for a real son, playful Pinocchio is eager to do good and become a real human.

programme.title: Sea Level
programme.desc: When poachers steal dozens of egg sacks from his reef, bamboo shark Pup makes it his personal mission to save his unhatched brothers and sisters. His rescue mission takes him above water into the world of man.

programme.title: Sea Level 2: Magic Arch
programme.desc: A young dolphin with an active imagination discovers a magic arch that makes wishes come true. However, when its enemies use the arch to become big and strong, it must find a way to stop them.

programme.title: Deep
programme.desc: When his colony is threatened by an accident, a mischievous octopus named Deep is sent to find help. His best friends, a sassy shrimp and a nervous anglerfish, join him on the perilous journey.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: A 12-year old boy and his misfit friends enlist an older woman in their fight to save Buster the baby elephant during the air raids on Belfast in 1941.

programme.title: Brave New Girl
programme.desc: Despite financial struggles, a single woman (Virginia Madsen) helps her daughter (Lindsey Haun) attend a school of music and dance.

programme.title: I Still See You
programme.desc: Ghosts inhabit what's left of the world after an apocalyptic event.

programme.title: Still Mine
programme.desc: A farmer (James Cromwell) fights back when local authorities hamper his efforts to build a cottage for his dementia-stricken wife (Geneviève Bujold).

programme.title: Undiscovered
programme.desc: A model (Pell James) moves to Los Angeles to launch an acting career and hatches a scheme to boost a singer's (Steven Strait) fame.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: While investigating a corrupt judge (Gary Cole), a detective (John Corbett) becomes romantically involved with the man's wife (Julie Benz).

programme.title: The Happy Elf
programme.desc: Eubie the Elf's attempts to bring Christmas joy to a dreary town called Bluesville test his enthusiasm.

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: A flying squirrel shows a young reindeer how to soar into the sky.

programme.title: Felix the Cat Saves Christmas
programme.desc: A cat must save Christmas when a professor wants to create a massive blizzard. Animated.

programme.title: Saving Christmas
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy attempts to scientifically prove Santa's existence. Meanwhile, his mother meets a handsome toy company executive who works for an old man with a white beard.

programme.title: Shelby
programme.desc: An orphaned dog (Rob Schneider) is taken in by Jake (John Paul Ruttan) on Christmas Eve, and has to hide from a dog catcher, Jake's parents, and a nasty great dame.

programme.title: The Nutcracker and the Magic Flute
programme.desc: Wishing to be carefree again instead of being forced to marry, 17-year-old Marie is magically shrunk down to the size of her childhood toys, which all come to life. There she discovers a nutcracker doll to be a prince who has been put under a spell.

programme.title: A Very Barry Christmas
programme.desc: Barry Buckley and Santa unwittingly trade lives in a Christmas mix-up.

programme.title: Santa's Apprentice
programme.desc: When the time for him to retire draws near, Santa Claus selects and trains a young orphan boy to become his successor.

programme.title: Saving Santa
programme.desc: A stable elf is the only one who can stop an invasion of the North Pole by using Santa's sleigh and a time globe to go back in time to save Santa.

programme.title: Christmas All Over Again
programme.desc: A mischievous boy must overcome his inner Scrooge or remain caught in a cycle where every day is a Christmas without presents.

programme.title: Ace & the Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A clumsy con man meets a beautiful woman who hires him to kidnap Ace, a talking and wisecracking racehorse.

programme.title: Charlie's Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A Christmas wish is granted.

programme.title: A Belle for Christmas

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: In 1994, convicted murderer Randolph Dial escapes from a prison in Oklahoma and takes the deputy warden's wife, Bobbi Parker, with him, then, 10 years later, Parker is found living with Dial on a farm in Texas.

programme.title: Dateline

programme.title: Ultimate Survival Alaska
programme.desc: When the outdoorsmen are assigned to climb and hike 30 miles over the snowy Tordrillo Mountains to the banks of Frustration Lake, one team encounters a canyon, another meets a wall of ice, and a third finds a potential avalanche situation.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival Alaska
programme.desc: The teams have 72 hours to navigate 50 miles of stormy rivers, including a stretch of rapids called Hell's Gate; the Endurance and Military teams hit the water immediately, while the Mountaineers hike two miles to a deeper, swifter-moving river.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival Alaska
programme.desc: The teams must cross the Hayes Glacier and then hack their way through dense forest to reach the endpoint, which is 30 miles away; the Mountaineers face an 80-foot ice wall; Endurance's strategy leads them into a 200-foot rappel.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival Alaska
programme.desc: As the teams cross a steep ridge and then hike 40 miles through Strandline Canyon, the Military and Mountaineer teams find themselves in quicksand; the Endurance team goes straight to the canyon, but they risk hypothermia by crossing a furious river.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival Alaska
programme.desc: The eighth leg of the expedition requires the teams to fight their way through alder thickets, cross the icy, fast-moving waters of Coal Creek, and climb a 600-foot rock fall, and the creek sweeps one of the Mountaineers downstream.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival Alaska
programme.desc: The teams visit Afognak Island, the home of some of the largest bears on earth, and travel north 31 miles across its treacherous terrain during the salmon's upstream run as massive bears confront them every step of the way.

programme.title: Honeymoon for One (2011)
programme.desc: A Los Angeles advertising exec travels to Ireland alone for her honeymoon after breaking things off with her dishonest fiancé. While abroad, she develops a connection with a local estate manager, but a conflict involving the woman's business threatens the budding romance.

programme.title: Help for the Holidays (2012)
programme.desc: An elf takes a job as a nanny in order to help a family revive their Christmas spirit, which has dwindled over the years as the parents' business has taken off. The elf, meanwhile, forms a bond with the kids and their uncle, and considers making her trip away from the North Pole a permanent move.

programme.title: Annie Claus Is Coming to Town (2011)
programme.desc: Santa's daughter Annie (Maria Thayer) leaves the North Pole to spend time in Los Angeles. While there, she falls for a duplicitous actor (Ryan Bittle), who was hired by a scheming elf to persuade Annie to stay in Los Angeles for good. Directed by Kevin Connor.

programme.title: Time Capsule (2020)
programme.desc: After 10 years, a group of high school friends reunite at their alma mater's field house to dig up their time capsule. When they open the time capsule they decide to relive their fun high school moments which inspire a newfound relationship.

programme.title: Late Bloomer (2016)
programme.desc: Botanist Jenny fled her small town and cruel high school couple Shane and Allison to track rare flowers around the globe. Now back, she's shocked to find Shane has become a teacher and even more surprised when he's determined to make it up to her.

programme.title: A Kiss at Midnight (2008)
programme.desc: A woman (Faith Ford) who runs a dating service registers with a rival Internet matchmaker to prove her business is better, but ends up being successfully matched with the site's owner (Cameron Daddo). Dyan Cannon and Hal Linden also star.

programme.title: Matchmaker Santa (2012)
programme.desc: A mysterious mall Santa arranges for a woman to be stranded with her boyfriend's assistant in a quaint town during the holidays.

programme.title: Dial S for Santa (2023)
programme.desc: A Christmas mystery with Lana, who comes back to her hometown to visit her mom for the holidays only to encounter Nick, a new police detective, with whom she teams up to discover who is behind a string of unusual burglaries in their town.

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas (2004)
programme.desc: This amiable holiday tale finds Santa Claus (Charles Durning) playing a matchmaker who sets up a harried social worker (Kelli Williams) with a boyish attorney (Patrick Muldoon). Martin Grant: Martin Mull.

programme.title: The Christmas Card (2006)
programme.desc: A soldier (John Newton) overseas receives a moving holiday card from a stranger and decides to track down the sender (Alice Evans) upon his return. Edward Asner, Lois Nettleton. Stephen Bridgewater directed.

programme.title: North by North Pole (2024)
programme.desc: A group of adventurers embarks on a thrilling quest to the North Pole. They face icy challenges, unexpected discoveries, and the true magic of friendship.

programme.title: Christmas in Canaan (2009)
programme.desc: A widower tries to ease the racial hostility between his young son and a classmate by forcing them to spend time together. The boys forge a bond while caring for a wounded puppy, but tensions in 1960's Texas aren't so easily resolved.

programme.title: Love's Christmas Journey (2011)
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Young widow Ellie goes to stay with her brother, who soon leaves town on business. While he's gone, one of his brood is accused of burning down a barn, and it's up to Ellie to clear his name with help from a handsome deputy.

programme.title: Love's Christmas Journey (2011)
programme.desc: Conclusion. Young widow Ellie goes to stay with her brother, who soon leaves town on business. While he's gone, one of his brood is accused of burning down a barn, and it's up to Ellie to clear his name with help from a handsome deputy.

programme.desc: During the holidays, a couple (Dean Cain and Jean Louisa Kelly) offer a temporary home to three orphaned boys well known for their bad behavior. When the boys begin to hope one of them will be adopted by the couple, they start a fierce competition to win the pair's affections. programme.desc: King Androcles of Thebes commands a ship in search of a threat to Greece, predicted by an atmospheric oracle. Ismene takes Hercules to Atlantis, where he discovers that her mother, Queen Antinea, has captured Androcles. Hercules schemes to rescue him and thwart Antinea's dream of world conquest.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: Strange events take place after a family (Ryan Reynolds, Melissa George, Jesse James) moves into a new house that was the site of several gruesome murders.

programme.title: The Wolfpack
programme.desc: Locked away from the outside world in a Manhattan apartment, the Angulo siblings satisfy their curiosity, imagination and need to explore by re-enacting their favorite movies.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Armed with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor, mercenary Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) adopts the alter ego Deadpool and hunts down the man (Ed Skrein) who nearly destroyed his life.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: A fugitive special forces team leaves mayhem in their wake in this action-packed update of the classic 1980s TV series.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: With his father (Will Smith) trapped in the wreckage of their spacecraft, a youth (Jaden Smith) treks across Earth's now-hostile terrain to recover their rescue beacon and signal for help.

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teen (Brenton Thwaites) discovers the dark truth about his community's secret past from an old man (Jeff Bridges) who is the sole keeper of their world's memories.

programme.title: Eighth Grade
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school -- the end of her thus far disastrous eighth-grade year.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A dope-smoking private detective (Joaquin Phoenix) navigates a psychedelic world of surfers, rockers, stoners, LAPD cops and more as he looks for a missing ex-girlfriend and her wealthy boyfriend.

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A portrait of this generation's youth living on the edge, the film follows Star (Sasha Lane), a free-spirited, teenage rebel who hits the road with a group of hard-partying, fellow misfits and discovers adventure, hope and first love.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple (Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton) and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Climbers (Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, John Hawkes) from two expeditions fight for survival during a fierce blizzard on Mount Everest.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Still alive in modern times, Frankenstein's creature (Aaron Eckhart) becomes caught in the middle, as gargoyles and demons wage war for the souls of mankind.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: The Hole in the Ground
programme.desc: One night, Sarah's young son disappears into the woods behind their rural home. When he returns, he looks the same, but his behavior grows increasingly disturbing. Sarah begins to believe that the boy who returned may not be her son at all.

programme.title: Whose Streets?
programme.desc: An account of the Ferguson uprising as told by the people who lived it. The filmmakers look at how the killing of 18-year-old Michael Brown inspired a community to fight back and sparked a global movement.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When the San Andreas fault triggers a magnitude 9 earthquake, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife (Carla Gugino) and daughter to safety.

programme.title: World's Greatest Dad
programme.desc: A high-school poetry teacher (Robin Williams) is also a single father and dreams of becoming a successful writer, but a freak accident leads to both tragedy and opportunity.

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A corporate executive (Drew Barrymore) falls for an affable schoolteacher (Jimmy Fallon) obsessed with the Boston Red Sox.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Family tensions arise after a woman (Nia Vardalos) falls in love with a man (John Corbett) who is not Greek.

programme.title: Everybody Wants to Be Italian
programme.desc: A lovelorn Polish fishmonger (Jay Jablonski) lies about his ethnicity to woo a beautiful Italian veterinarian (Cerina Vincent).

programme.title: Mon Oncle Antoine
programme.desc: A teenage boy living in a mining town works part-time with his uncle to help with the Christmas rush at his uncle's store, where he begins to develop new feelings for a young female coworker and comes to terms with his mortality for the first time.

programme.title: My Night at Maud's
programme.desc: A devout Catholic man moves to a town in the hopes of marrying a girl named Francoise, but he joins an old school friend on a night out and ends up spending the night having philosophical discussions with a recently divorced woman.

programme.title: The Daughter of Rosie O'Grady
programme.desc: A young woman, whose drunkard father tries to keep her and her sister away from the advances of predatory men, seeks to become a successful singer, and in the process, she falls madly in love with a theatrical impresario.

programme.title: I Wouldn't Be In Your Shoes
programme.desc: A dancer finds himself framed for a brutal murder when his shoe prints were discovered at the scene of the crime, but more problems ensue when his beautiful wife begins an investigation of her own in hopes of clearing her husband's name.

programme.title: My Reputation
programme.desc: Tongues begin to wag when a lonely widow becomes romantically involved with a military man.

programme.title: The Man I Love
programme.desc: A sultry singer falls in love with a struggling jazz pianist, but the gangster who owns their nightclub has other ideas.

programme.title: Larceny, Inc.
programme.desc: Three bumbling ex-convicts manage to work together to develop a clever plot to purchase the luggage store located next to a bank in order to begin tunneling into the bank's money-filled vault for a major payoff, but things don't go as planned.

programme.title: Backfire
programme.desc: Once a former G.I. is discharged from the veteran's hospital where he's been recovering from surgery, he and the nurse who's fallen in love with him embark on a search to find his missing friend, who may be involved in a murder case.

programme.title: Period of Adjustment
programme.desc: When a Korean War veteran hastily marries a woman he met in the hospital, they have a quarrelsome honeymoon in Florida as they visit his old war buddy, whose wife has just walked out of his life, taking their child with her.

programme.title: Holiday Affair
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, a department store clerk named Steve Mason meets a big spending customer who is really a commercial spy, and after letting her go, is fired from his job, but despite this, a blossoming romance grows between them.

programme.title: Desk Set
programme.desc: An efficiency expert is secretly hired by a television company to computerize its research department, but he finds himself falling in love with its supervisor, who is a need-to-know, controlling woman that grows suspicious of him.

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: A reporter makes use of a naive homeless man by hiring him to pose as the subject of her latest story, but when a newspaper publisher gets wind of the sensation, he hires the man to spearhead a national goodwill drive to advance his political career.

programme.title: The Thin Man
programme.desc: When an eccentric inventor goes missing and his stock certificates are stolen, his desperate daughter is forced to get help from a retired private detective and his wife, who embark on an investigation to unveil the murder.

programme.title: Cover-Up
programme.desc: An insurance investigator looks into a Midwestern man's apparent suicide and discovers clues that lead him to believe the man was murdered, but no one, except for a beautiful woman in town, will agree to help him solve the crime.

programme.title: Carol for Another Christmas
programme.desc: An industrial tycoon that has never recovered from the death of his 22-year-old son, who was killed in action during Chrismas Eve of 1944, has only disgust for American involvement in international matters, but he learns more when visited by ghosts.

programme.title: Three Godfathers
programme.desc: When three outlaws on the lamb discover a dying woman and her baby, they make a promise to bring the infant along with them to safety across the desert, even if it means risking their own lives to save the helpless child.

programme.title: Big Business
programme.desc: After enduring excruciatingly slow business, two California Christmas tree salesmen get in an argument with an ornery customer, escalating into a full out brawl where the customer's home and garden are completely destroyed.

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: A money-hungry nephew is trying to get his rich aunt deemed incompetent so he can take control of her assets, and the only way it can be avoided is if she can locate her three long-lost sons, but unfortunately that task is proving to be difficult.

programme.title: Bundle of Joy
programme.desc: A recently fired salesgirl finds an abandoned baby on the steps of the foundling home and is mistaken for the mother, and the well-meaning son of a department store owner tries to help her with the baby and a budding romance begins.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: A close-knit Midwestern family with four beautiful daughters is forced to cope with the alarming news that they will be moving to New York City, while the older daughters deal with love, heartbreak and life in a small town.

programme.title: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
programme.desc: When a family leaves their luxurious New York City mansion unattended for a vacation during the Christmas holiday season, a small group of homeless people decide to utilize the opportunity to make the residence their home for a few days.

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: A chic magazine writer who is supposed to be an expert homemaker must entertain her boss and a heroic war veteran at her farm for the holidays, a test that threatens to expose her as a fraud and may place her job and her personal life in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Shop Around the Corner
programme.desc: A young man working in a Budapest gift shop falls in love with an unknown woman he has only interacted with through letters, and the mysterious lady develops mutual feelings, not realizing he is the co-worker with whom she is always feuding.

programme.desc: When an Episcopal bishop, who has been working for months to obtain funds for a new cathedral, loses sight of his family and calling, a kind angel is sent to help him, but the bishop fears the angel is trying to replace him at work and home.

programme.title: Room for One More
programme.desc: Despite her husband's reluctance, a goodhearted woman, who gives lost cats and dogs a home, takes in a troubled orphan who recently tried to kill herself and tries to integrate the young woman into her family of three children.

programme.title: Esta historia me suena
programme.desc: Carmen siente que su matrimonio ya no tiene el mismo encanto de antes, por lo que su esposo Jorge está en busca de aventuras fuera de casa.

programme.title: El Chavo
programme.desc: El señor Barriga le pide a don Ramón que deje el departamento cuanto antes por su falta de pago. El Chavo y Quico encuentran un álbum de fotos y se sorprenden al ver que Don Ramón era un gran boxeador.

programme.title: El Chavo
programme.desc: El Chavo compra pan para Don Ramón pero termina comiéndoselo todo. Don Ramón le enseña al Chavo a ser un gran boxeador y ser como él en sus buenos tiempos.

programme.title: Clase 406
programme.desc: Jessica llega a la casa de Kike para confesarle toda la verdad sobre su actitud con él. Gaby le confiesa algo al Caballo.

programme.title: La Gata
programme.desc: Lorenza inventa una situación relacionada a Esmeralda y le miente a Pablo.

programme.title: Como dice el dicho
programme.desc: Clara es la nueva jefa de campaña de Adán, su suegro, sin embargo, al enterarse de que es un corrupto, intentará hacer justicia a la gente que se ha visto afectada por su corrupción.

programme.title: Corona de lágrimas
programme.desc: Cuando Refugio y sus tres hijos, Patricio, Edmundo e Ignacio son echados de su hogar, por obra del destino llegan a la Ciudad de México, donde inician una nueva vida.

programme.title: Mi corazón es tuyo
programme.desc: La vida de una joven mujer que trabaja como bailarina da un giro cuando se convierte en niñera de los 7 hijos de un hombre viudo.

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: Cuando un tímido cuidador de un zoológico decide cambiar de trabajo para poder encontrar a su futura pareja, los animales del zoológico revelan su habilidad secreta de hablar y le enseñan a cortejar a las mujeres.

programme.title: No hay nada como las fiestas
programme.desc: Revelaciones secretas se hacen entre los miembros de una familia de Chicago en la reunión de Navidad.

programme.title: ¿Quién caerá?
programme.desc: Divertido programa de concursos en el que los participantes deben de mostrar sus conocimientos de cultura en general para evitar caer del escenario.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Un empleado de mantenimiento chino le enseña artes marciales a un niño estadounidense para ayudar al joven a enfrentar a unos acosadores en su nueva escuela.

programme.title: Como dice el dicho
programme.desc: Clara es la nueva jefa de campaña de Adán, su suegro, sin embargo, al enterarse de que es un corrupto, intentará hacer justicia a la gente que se ha visto afectada por su corrupción.

programme.desc: Un empleado de mantenimiento chino le enseña artes marciales a un niño estadounidense para ayudar al joven a enfrentar a unos acosadores en su nueva escuela.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Un grupo de exploradores, liderado por un extrovertido director de cine, visitan Skull Island para investigar todo lo relacionado con la leyenda del gorila gigante llamado King Kong. Ahí encuentran una jungla llena de criaturas prehistóricas.

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: Hace 20.000 años, en plena glaciación, un joven resulta herido durante una cacería y sus compañeros se marchan, dándolo por muerto. El joven despierta y encuentra a un lobo que fue abandonado por su manada. Hombre y lobo intentarán sobrevivir juntos.

programme.title: La Gata
programme.desc: Esmeralda está con la familia Negrete, ayudando tanto a Lorenza, quien finge un malestar, como a don Agustín. Javier sospecha de una intención obscura de Lorenza hacia Esmeralda, por lo que la quiere tener cerca.

programme.desc: Fernando quiere casarse con Ana por la iglesia así que pide la anulación de su matrimonio con Isabela por hacerle creer que Diego Nicolás es su hijo. Ana confirma su embarazo.

programme.desc: Natalia descubre que nunca podrá ser madre. Charlotte trata de convencer a Bacalao de darle una muestra de sangre para la prueba de ADN.

programme.desc: Andrés amenaza a Miriam con un arma para recuperar los papeles que prueban sus crímenes. Alina le pide a Santiago una oportunidad para estar juntos, pero él la rechaza y ella le dice que arruinará su vida.

programme.desc: The corpse of a Russian model shows many old injuries, convincing the detectives that she had been the victim of abuse.
